result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin L. Schutz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: with good time and is eligible for huber if he meets jail requirements

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin L. Schutz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Justin L. Schutz in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Defendant Justin L. Schutz in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 14 CF 134 and 14 CF 84.  1:30 PM Court calls case and recites appearances.  State addressed the Court.  Off the record for court to review PSI.   1:44 PM back on the record - No additions or corrections on PSI - State amending DJOC #9 -  strike 5 years and put completion the DJOC which is 8 years.  Court grants and amends wording.  State #8 - register as a sex offender for 8 years instead of 15 years.  Court grants and amends document.  State argues sentencing  #8 - 8 yrs as to count 2 of 13 CF 73.  Court grants request and enters it on the DJOC.  State makes further arguement.  Atty Hoffman argues sentencing.  Court questions Atty's as to the DJOC.  State makes stmt.  Atty Hoffman makes further arguement.  Court addressed the defendant.  Atty Hoffman makes stmt.  Court victim impact stmt rec'd for today's hearing

COURT:  13 CF 73 - plea nc on ct 1 - accepts plea and defers entry of judgment
             
                       Count 2:  Sentence w/held probation 1 year - costs - register as a sex offender today - DNA sample and surcharge

14 CF 84:  Sentence w/held probation 5 years concurrent with 13 CF 73 - costs - recommendations as outlined in psi - no unsupervised contacts with minors without capable adult supervision

14 CF 134: Sentence 360 days with good time and credit for 174 days time served - may have work release if jail agrees - costs
copy of PSI to both Atty's
Sentencing hearing on April 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Justin L. Schutz in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Defendant Justin L. Schutz in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Heard with 14 CF 84 and 14 CF 134
3:28 PM Court calls case and appearances.Time and date for status but court has been handed plea agreement and it appears parties have reached a resolution.
Amends charges to 948.025 (1) (d) - Atty Frost and Atty Hoffman agree. 
3:32 PM off the record 
3:36 PM back on the record 
Atty Hoffman does not object to Court amending charges
Atty Frost recites plea agreement of parties to the Court. Atty Hoffman agrees with agreement
Court addresses / questions defendant re: constitutional rights
Defendant pleas:
13CF73 defendant pleads no contest count 1, no contest count 2
14CF84 defendant pleads no contest
14CF134 defendant pleads no contest
Court finds guilty on second count on 13cf73 and guilty on both 14cf84 and 14cf134. Court orders PSI - author not required to be present.  Bond will continue pending further order of the court.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on January 27, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Defendant Justin L. Schutz in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Defendant Justin L. Schutz in custody.  Thomas frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 14 CF 84 and 14 CF 134.  3:42 PM Court calls case and recites appearances.  State moved to amend 13 CF 73 to add  948.10 as a misd.  State makes stmt need to do further work on this case.  Status conference scheduled for January 27, 2015 at 03:15 pm.
Status conference on December 16, 2014 at 03:15 pm.

Defendant Justin L. Schutz in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Defendant Justin L. Schutz in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  14 CF 84 and 14 CF 134.  Atty Hoffman states agreement has been reached needs a plea date.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 16, 2014 at 03:15 pm.
Status conference on November 14, 2014 at 09:15 am.

Defendant Justin L. Schutz in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Defendant Justin L. Schutz in custody.  Thomas H Frost appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 14 CF 84 and 14 CF 134.  State resolution has not been met as new charge has been filed.  INIT on 14 CF 134.    Atty Hoffman waived reading and waived preliminary hearing.  Court questions defendant as to his right to a preliminary exam.  Defendant does not wish to have a preliminary exam.  Court finds defendant has freely waived his preliminary exam.  Finds probable cause and binds the defendant over for trial.  Information tendered as to 14 CF 134.  Atty Hoffman waived reading entered plea of not guilty - Court enlarged time for substitution 11/24/14 and defense motions.  Bail will continue.  Status conference scheduled for November 14, 2014 at 09:15 am.
